name: Christmas Blast Legend
description:
This is a new Match 3 game created by Young Stars, the creator of "16 Squares" and "Jelly Blast Legend 2017" games!

Jelly Fruit Blast Legend is a match-3 game, puzzle and adventure. It's a hit game that will have you making an explosion for hours on end. 
You will start your sweet journey to complete crushes deliciously and make sweet pet element on jelly land.
Rules or game play is absolutely simple to suit everyone's taste. Just swap and match 3 or more same jelly blast to eliminate them, try to make more combos such as jelly paradise. It's simple, but once you play, you will find it very challenge.
****************************************************************************
How to play?
- Touch to swap 3 or more same elements to eliminate them
- Match 4 same jelly on line to create a jelly blast
- Join jellies to create 2 lines with 3 same elements of each line at the same time, jelly boom is created
- Smash 5 same soda on line to create a jelly clash bomb.
- Swap the jelly with any gem to make a super jelly dash, destroy all
- Breaking the obstacles quickly as possible to pass mission best score

Features
- FREE GAME and NO INTERNET.
- Currently the game has 600 levels. And more.
- Music and graphics in game are funny.
- Requests to earn fun rewards and daily reward.
- Keep progress game on server.
- Get diamond when complete each level.
- Share with friends.
- Exciting lighting effects while playing including blast mania, lighting splash, candy boom.
- Easy and fun to start but a challenge to fully master.
****************************************************************************************
Download Jelly Fruit Blast Legend now to start your saga! Enjoy!
